security: This document contains personal information, including a social security number, date of birth, and medical confinement details. Revealing this could violate privacy laws and harm the individual mentioned.
summary: A memorandum from John Moriarty to Clifford Fenton regarding Mary Ceciliadell Bertucci's call to the HSCA, requesting modifications to previous reports about a reward and claiming a familial connection to John F. Kennedy.
summary_one_paragraph: On July 20, 1978, John Moriarty sent a memo to Clifford Fenton at the HSCA, detailing a call from Mary Ceciliadell Bertucci who sought to modify previous reports by Bill Brown concerning 'the reward'. Bertucci, currently confined at De Paul Hospital in New Orleans, claimed to be John F. Kennedy's first cousin and stated that Judge Garrison is her attorney of record. Moriarty checked Bill Brown's files, finding she reiterated the essential story and added her maiden name, date of birth, and Social Security number, none of which were verified.
title: Mary Ceciliadell Bertucci 010088
